item.description:
Lean Startup Circle Boston is excited to partner with the upcoming Lean Startup Challenge to do this special Lean Startup Circle Meetup from the beautiful MassChallenge offices.

 

Customer Development Stories with Brant Cooper

Brant has been working directly with startups on Customer Development for over two years.  At Thursday's Meetup, he'll  share real life stories about life in the #CustDev trenches: successes, problems, and pitfalls experienced in applying these principles in a variety of business models. 

Bring your own experiences, questions and issues and join the discussion!

 

About Brant Cooper

As co-author of the new book The Entrepreneur's Guide to Customer Development, Brant is a leading advocate of the Lean Startup movement. He has over 17 years of success bringing high tech products to market, directing the strategy, design, and launch of key technologies.

http://www.custdev.com/

 

About The Lean Startup Challenge

The Lean Startup Challenge is a new, early stage startup competition based on Lean Startup. It's a six-week contest that kicks off July 15th, in which teams will launch a new website or enter an existing one, then take it through multiple iterations, (hopefully) gaining traction with each revision. At the end of the competition, the team with the superior quantitative results is selected as the winner that has demonstrated mastery of the three methodologies listed above.

http://www.leanstartupchallenge.com/
item.how_to_find_us: Check in at the front desk and proceed up to the 14th floor
item.name: Lean Startup Circle Boston Monthly Meetup
